#### Plastic Parts & Production {#coat-indcom-plastic_part}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-plastic_part-setup}
PLASTIC_PART_CATEGORIES <- c(
  "#262 Plastic Parts & Prod. Ctg." = 262,
  "#263 Plastic Parts & Prod. C/U" = 263, # "C/U" means "cleanup solvent"
  "#1920 Plastic Parts & Prod. Ctg. (Area)" = 1920,
  "#1921 Plastic Parts & Prod. C/U (Area)" = 1921)
```

##### History {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-plastic_part-emission-chart}
BY2011_annual_emission_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    PLASTIC_PART_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emissions_by(
    fill = category) 
```

##### Emission Factors (Area) {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-plastic_part-annual_emfac-chart}
BY2011_annual_area_source_emission_factor_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    PLASTIC_PART_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emission_factors_by(
    color = category)
```

##### Growth {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-plastic_part-growth-chart, fig.height=6, out.height=600}
BY2011_annual_growth_factor_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    PLASTIC_PART_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_growth_factors_by(
    color = cnty_abbr) 
```

##### Control {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-plastic_part-control-chart}
BY2011_annual_control_factor_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    PLASTIC_PART_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_control_factors_by(
    color = pollutant) 
```

##### BY2011 vs DataBank (Point) {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-plastic_part-BY-vs-DB-chart}
BY2011_annual_emission_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    PLASTIC_PART_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY_vs_DB_point_source_annual_emissions()
```
